author: skeshri
body:
closed previous pull request 15150.

latest presetation(will present next week) : https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/uNpVR3EYnz7EFcb
presented in Tk alignment meeting on 22 June : https://indico.cern.ch/event/536850/contributions/2215484/attachments/1296737/1933823/TkAlmeeting_22_June_2016.pdf

This tool is useful to calculate cosmic event and track rate. For more details one can browse through the twiki : https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/TkAlCosmicsRateMonitoring
title: Fresh pull request for Cosmic rate tool.
